alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor; Lafayette; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 7:57PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT LAFAYETTE...DIXIE...NORTHEASTERN TAYLOR AND EASTERN MADISON COUNTIES THROUGH 845 PM EST... At 756 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from Blue Springs to 11 miles southeast of Perry to 9 miles northeast of Steinhatchee to 20 miles south of Horseshoe Point. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mayo, Cross City, Horseshoe Point, Suwannee, Lee, Horseshoe Beach, Tennille, Shamrock, Clara, Cross City Airport, Shired Island, Old Town, Buckville, Jonesboro, Hatch Bend, Salem, San Pedro Junction, Cooks Hammock, Chancey, and Smith. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Dixie; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor; Lafayette; Madison
